resources.string: The story format disables Click to Action on the Ad’s Media View itself. While the Click To Dismiss Action and Ad’s Click-To-Action (CTA) to Swipe Up gesture can be handled by the developer
The ApStory class allows developers to load and display Story/Reels/Shorts type Native ads seamlessly within various UI components such as RecyclerView, ViewPager2, and Jetpack Compose.
